title: Need sales leads and/or appointments with Marketing Managers for Printed Material
snippet:
1. Search all zip codes in Fort Myers, Florida, USA for  companies that have Marketing Departments or the following positions:  Marketing Manager, 
Marketing Coordinator 
Creative Director or 
Any person that outsources printed material

2.  By Phone, contact these companies to speak with one of the above to schedule a phone or in-person appointment with Tracy (me), for the purpose of discussing their printing needs.
